Title: Allows a parent who suffers an involuntary loss of pregnancy to automatically receive temporary disability benefits
Summary: Allows a parent who suffers an involuntary loss of pregnancy to automatically receive temporary disability benefits upon notice that such parents suffered an involuntary loss of pregnancy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to allowing a parent who suffers an involuntary loss of a pregnancy be automatically enrolled in temporary disability benefits
